update fkt_document set DTYPE = #{DTYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESSFIRSTLINE = #{ADDRESSFIRSTLINE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILLINGTYPE = #{BILLINGTYPE,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CONSULTANT = #{CONSULTANT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMERREF = #{CUSTOMERREF,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATEADDED = #{DATEADDED,jdbcType=DATE}, DELETED = #{DELETED,jdbcType=BIT}, DEPOSIT = #{DEPOSIT,jdbcType=BIT}, DOCUMENTDATE = #{DOCUMENTDATE,jdbcType=DATE}, DUEDAYS = #{DUEDAYS,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ITEMSREBATE = #{ITEMSREBATE,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, MODIFIED = #{MODIFIED,jdbcType=DATE}, MODIFIEDBY = #{MODIFIEDBY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NETGROSS = #{NETGROSS,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ODTPATH = #{ODTPATH,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDERDATE = #{ORDERDATE,jdbcType=DATE}, PAID = #{PAID,jdbcType=BIT}, PAIDVALUE = #{PAIDVALUE,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, PAYDATE = #{PAYDATE,jdbcType=DATE}, PDFPATH = #{PDFPATH,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRINTTEMPLATE = #{PRINTTEMPLATE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRINTED = #{PRINTED,jdbcType=BIT}, PROGRESS = #{PROGRESS,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SERVICEDATE = #{SERVICEDATE,jdbcType=DATE}, SHIPPINGAUTOVAT = #{SHIPPINGAUTOVAT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHIPPINGVALUE = #{SHIPPINGVALUE,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, TOTALVALUE = #{TOTALVALUE,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, TRANSACTIONID = #{TRANSACTIONID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, VALIDFROM = #{VALIDFROM,jdbcType=DATE}, VALIDTO = #{VALIDTO,jdbcType=DATE}, WEBSHOPDATE = #{WEBSHOPDATE,jdbcType=DATE}, WEBSHOPID = #{WEBSHOPID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FK_INDIVIDUALINFO = #{FK_INDIVIDUALINFO,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FK_CONTACT = #{FK_CONTACT,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FK_DELIVERYCONTACT = #{FK_DELIVERYCONTACT,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DOCUMENT_INVOICEREFERENCE = #{DOCUMENT_INVOICEREFERENCE,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FK_NOVATREF = #{FK_NOVATREF,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FK_PAYMENT = #{FK_PAYMENT,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FK_SHIPPING = #{FK_SHIPPING,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FK_SRCDOCUMENT = #{FK_SRCDOCUMENT,jdbcType=BIGINT} where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: fkt_document.ID, fkt_document.DTYPE, ADDRESSFIRSTLINE, BILLINGTYPE, CONSULTANT, CUSTOMERREF, fkt_document.DATEADDED, fkt_document.DELETED, DEPOSIT, DOCUMENTDATE, DUEDAYS, ITEMSREBATE, fkt_document.MODIFIED, fkt_document.MODIFIEDBY, fkt_document.NAME, NETGROSS, ODTPATH, ORDERDATE, PAID, PAIDVALUE, PAYDATE, PDFPATH, PRINTTEMPLATE, PRINTED, PROGRESS, SERVICEDATE, SHIPPINGAUTOVAT, SHIPPINGVALUE, TOTALVALUE, TRANSACTIONID, fkt_document.VALIDFROM, fkt_document.VALIDTO, WEBSHOPDATE, WEBSHOPID, FK_INDIVIDUALINFO, FK_CONTACT, FK_DELIVERYCONTACT, DOCUMENT_INVOICEREFERENCE, FK_NOVATREF, fkt_document.FK_PAYMENT, FK_SHIPPING, FK_SRCDOCUMENT, DATE_ADD(DOCUMENTDATE,INTERVAL DUEDAYS DAY) AS DUEDATE
fkt_contact.ID AS CONTACT_ID, COMPANY, VATNUMBER, fkt_contact.FIRSTNAME AS CONTACT_FIRSTNAME,fkt_contact.NAME AS CONTACT_NAME

fkt_documentitem.ID AS DOCUMENTITEM_ID, fkt_documentitem.DATEADDED AS DOCUMENTITEM_DATEADDED, fkt_documentitem.DELETED AS DOCUMENTITEM_DELETED, GTIN, ITEMNUMBER, ITEMREBATE, ITEMTYPE, fkt_documentitem.MODIFIED AS DOCUMENTITEM_MODIFIED, fkt_documentitem.MODIFIEDBY AS DOCUMENTITEM_MODIFIEDBY, fkt_documentitem.NAME AS DOCUMENTITEM_NAME, NOVAT, OPTIONAL, POSNR, PRICE, QUANTITY, QUANTITYUNIT, TARA, fkt_documentitem.VALIDFROM AS DOCUMENTITEM_VALIDFROM, fkt_documentitem.VALIDTO AS DOCUMENTITEM_VALIDTO, fkt_documentitem.VESTINGPERIODEND, fkt_documentitem.VESTINGPERIODSTART, WEIGHT, FK_VAT, FK_PRODUCT, FK_DOCUMENT

fkt_address.ID AS ADDRESS_ID, CITY, CITYADDON, COUNTRYCODE, fkt_address.DATEADDED AS ADDRESS_DATEADDED, fkt_address.DELETED AS ADDRESS_DELETED, MANUALADDRESS, fkt_address.MODIFIED AS ADDRESS_MODIFIED, fkt_address.MODIFIEDBY AS ADDRESS_MODIFIEDBY, fkt_address.NAME AS ADDRESS_NAME, STREET, fkt_address.VALIDFROM AS ADDRESS_VALIDFROM, fkt_address.VALIDTO AS ADDRESS_VALIDTO, ZIP

fkt_vat.ID AS VAT_ID, fkt_vat.DATEADDED AS VAT_DATEADDED, fkt_vat.DELETED AS VAT_DELETED, fkt_vat.DESCRIPTION AS VAT_DESCRIPTION, fkt_vat.MODIFIED AS VAT_MODIFIED, fkt_vat.MODIFIEDBY AS VAT_MODIFIEDBY, fkt_vat.NAME AS VAT_NAME, TAXVALUE, fkt_vat.VALIDFROM AS VAT_VALIDFROM, fkt_vat.VALIDTO AS VAT_VALIDTO, VAT_CATEGORY
mapper.select:
select
,
,
,
,
,
,
from fkt_document INNER JOIN fkt_contact ON fkt_document.FK_CONTACT = fkt_contact.ID INNER JOIN fkt_documentitem ON fkt_document.ID = fkt_documentitem.FK_DOCUMENT INNER JOIN fkt_address ON fkt_contact.FK_ADDRESS = fkt_address.ID INNER JOIN fkt_vat ON fkt_vat.ID = fkt_documentitem.FK_VAT where fkt_document.DTYPE = #{documentoTipo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and fkt_document.NAME = #{documentoNumero,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and fkt_document.DELETED = #{eliminado,jdbcType=BIT}
ORDER BY TAXVALUE ASC, DOCUMENTITEM_NAME ASC

select
,
,
,
,
,
,
from fkt_document INNER JOIN fkt_contact ON fkt_document.FK_CONTACT = fkt_contact.ID INNER JOIN fkt_documentitem ON fkt_document.ID = fkt_documentitem.FK_DOCUMENT INNER JOIN fkt_address ON fkt_contact.FK_ADDRESS = fkt_address.ID INNER JOIN fkt_vat ON fkt_vat.ID = fkt_documentitem.FK_VAT where fkt_document.ID = #{ID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
ORDER BY TAXVALUE ASC, DOCUMENTITEM_NAME ASC

select
,
,
,
,
,
,
from fkt_document INNER JOIN fkt_contact ON fkt_document.FK_CONTACT = fkt_contact.ID INNER JOIN fkt_documentitem ON fkt_document.ID = fkt_documentitem.FK_DOCUMENT INNER JOIN fkt_address ON fkt_contact.FK_ADDRESS = fkt_address.ID INNER JOIN fkt_vat ON fkt_vat.ID = fkt_documentitem.FK_VAT where fkt_contact.VATNUMBER = #{clienteRUC,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and fkt_document.DOCUMENTDATE between STR_TO_DATE(#{fechaInicio,jdbcType=DATE} ,'%d/%m/%Y') and STR_TO_DATE(#{fechaFin,jdbcType=DATE},'%d/%m/%Y') and fkt_document.DTYPE = #{tipoDocumento,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and fkt_document.DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT} and fkt_documentitem.DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT} and fkt_document.NAME NOT IN ('PDTMP-01','PDTMP-02','PDTMP-03','PDTMP-04')
ORDER BY TAXVALUE ASC, DOCUMENTITEM_NAME ASC
